title: #134: The Ultimate Fighting Conspiracies With Aaron Bowden and Unbeliever Media's Jerry
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another fun festive episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome Returning Champion Aaron Bowden and YouTube superstar from Unbeliever Media, Jerry, to discuss the conspiracies surround UFC 229's Khabib vs McGregor. This is a fun episode.
Check out Jerry's Youtube channel.....
https://www.youtube.com/unbelievermedia
Check out our sponsors......
BETDSI.com and use the promo code "Hat100" for all of your betting needs.
RidgeWallet.com and the promo code "TFH10" for 10% off and worldwide free shipping of their awesome RFID blocking minimalist front pocket wallet.
